Hadoop HDFS Change Log

Release 0.21.0 - 2010-08-13

  • INCOMPATIBLE CHANGES    (15)
    1. HDFS-538. Per the contract elucidated in HADOOP-6201, throw FileNotFoundException from FileSystem::listStatus rather than returning null.
      (Jakob Homan via cdouglas)
    2. HDFS-602. DistributedFileSystem mkdirs throws FileAlreadyExistsException instead of FileNotFoundException.
      (Boris Shkolnik via suresh)
    3. HDFS-544. Add a "rbw" subdir to DataNode data directory.
      (hairong)
    4. HDFS-576. Block report includes under-construction replicas.
      (shv)
    5. HDFS-636. SafeMode counts complete blocks only.
      (shv)
    6. HDFS-644. Lease recovery, concurrency support.
      (shv)
    7. HDFS-570. Get last block length from a data-node when opening a file being written to. (Tsz Wo (Nicholas), SZE via shv)
    8. HDFS-657. Remove unused legacy data-node protocol methods.
      (shv)
    9. HDFS-658. Block recovery for primary data-node.
      (shv)
    10. HDFS-660. Remove deprecated methods from InterDatanodeProtocol.
      (shv)
    11. HDFS-512. Block.equals() and compareTo() compare blocks based only on block Ids, ignoring generation stamps.
      (shv)
    12. HDFS-873. Configuration specifies data-node storage directories as URIs.
      (shv)
    13. HDFS-905. Use the new UserGroupInformation from HDFS-6299.
      (jghoman via omalley)
    14. HDFS-984. Persistent delegation tokens.
      (Jitendra Pandey via shv)
    15. HDFS-1016. HDFS side change for HADOOP-6569. This jira changes the error message on the screen when cat a directory or a non-existent file.
      (hairong)
  • NEW FEATURES    (38)
    1. HDFS-1134. Large-scale Automated Framework.
      (cos)
    2. HDFS-436. Introduce AspectJ framework for HDFS code and tests.
      (Konstantin Boudnik via szetszwo)
    3. HDFS-447. Add LDAP lookup to hdfsproxy.
      (Zhiyong Zhang via cdouglas)
    4. HDFS-459. Introduce Job History Log Analyzer.
      (shv)
    5. HDFS-461. Tool to analyze file size distribution in HDFS.
      (shv)
    6. HDFS-492. Add two JSON JSP pages to the Namenode for providing corrupt blocks/replicas information.
      (Bill Zeller via szetszwo)
    7. HDFS-578. Add support for new FileSystem method for clients to get server defaults.
      (Kan Zhang via suresh)
    8. HDFS-595. umask settings in configuration may now use octal or symbolic instead of decimal.
      (Jakob Homan via suresh)
    9. HADOOP-6234. Updated hadoop-core and test jars to propagate new option dfs.umaskmode in configuration.
      (Jakob Homan via suresh)
    10. HDFS-235. Add support for byte ranges in HftpFileSystem to serve range of bytes from a file.
      (Bill Zeller via suresh)
    11. HDFS-385. Add support for an experimental API that allows a module external to HDFS to specify how HDFS blocks should be placed.
      (dhruba)
    12. HADOOP-4952. Update hadoop-core and test jars to propagate new FileContext file system application interface. (Sanjay Radia via suresh).
    13. HDFS-567. Add block forensics contrib tool to print history of corrupt and missing blocks from the HDFS logs. (Bill Zeller, Jitendra Nath Pandey via suresh).
    14. HDFS-610. Support o.a.h.fs.FileContext.
      (Sanjay Radia via szetszwo)
    15. HDFS-536. Support hflush at DFSClient.
      (hairong)
    16. HDFS-517. Introduce BlockInfoUnderConstruction to reflect block replica states while writing.
      (shv)
    17. HDFS-565. Introduce block committing logic during new block allocation and file close.
      (shv)
    18. HDFS-537. DataNode exposes a replica's meta info to BlockReceiver for the support of dfs writes/hflush. It also updates a replica's bytes received, bytes on disk, and bytes acked after receiving a packet.
      (hairong)
    19. HDFS-585. Datanode should serve up to visible length of a replica for read requests.
      (szetszwo)
    20. HDFS-604. Block report processing for append.
      (shv)
    21. HDFS-619. Support replica recovery initialization in datanode for the new append design.
      (szetszwo)
    22. HDFS-592. Allow clients to fetch a new generation stamp from NameNode for pipeline recovery.
      (hairong)
    23. HDFS-624. Support a new algorithm for pipeline recovery and pipeline setup for append.
      (hairong)
    24. HDFS-627. Support replica update in data-node. (Tsz Wo (Nicholas), SZE and Hairong Kuang via shv)
    25. HDFS-642. Support pipeline close and close error recovery.
      (hairong)
    26. HDFS-631. Rename configuration keys towards API standardization and backward compatibility.
      (Jitendra Nath Pandey via suresh)
    27. HDFS-669. Add unit tests framework (Mockito)
      (cos, Eli Collins)
    28. HDFS-731. Support new Syncable interface in HDFS.
      (hairong)
    29. HDFS-702. Add HDFS implementation of AbstractFileSystem.
      (Sanjay Radio via suresh)
    30. HDFS-758. Add decommissioning status page to Namenode Web UI.
      (Jitendra Nath Pandey via suresh)
    31. HDFS-814. Add an api to get the visible length of a DFSDataInputStream.
      (szetszwo)
    32. HDFS-654. Add support new atomic rename functionality in HDFS for supporting rename in FileContext.
      (suresh)
    33. HDFS-222. Support for concatenating of files into a single file without copying.
      (Boris Shkolnik via hairong)
    34. HDFS-933. Adds Delegation token based authentication in the NameNode.
      (Kan Zhang via ddas)
    35. HDFS-935. Adds a real user component in Delegation token.
      (Jitendra Nath Pandey via ddas)
    36. HDFS-245. Adds a symlink implementation to HDFS. This complements the new symlink feature added in HADOOP-6421
      (Eli Collins via Sanjay Radia)
    37. HDFS-1009. Support Kerberos authorization in HDFSProxy.
      (Srikanth Sundarrajan via szetszwo)
    38. HDFS-1091. Implement listStatus that returns an iterator of FileStatus.
      (hairong)
  • IMPROVEMENTS    (135)
    1. HDFS-1199. Extract a subset of tests for smoke (DOA) validation.
      (cos)
    2. HDFS-381. Remove blocks from DataNode maps when corresponding file is deleted.
      (Suresh Srinivas via rangadi)
    3. HDFS-377. Separate codes which implement DataTransferProtocol.
      (szetszwo)
    4. HDFS-396. NameNode image and edits directories are specified as URIs.
      (Luca Telloli via rangadi)
    5. HDFS-444. Allow to change probability levels dynamically in the fault injection framework.
      (Konstantin Boudnik via szetszwo)
    6. HDFS-352. Documentation for saveNamespace command.
      (Ravi Phulari via shv)
    7. HADOOP-6106. Updated hadoop-core and test jars from hudson trunk build #12.
      (Giridharan Kesavan)
    8. HDFS-204. Add a new metrics FilesInGetListingOps to the Namenode.
      (Jitendra Nath Pandey via szetszwo)
    9. HDFS-278. HDFS Outputstream close does not hang forever.
      (dhruba)
    10. HDFS-443. Add a new metrics numExpiredHeartbeats to the Namenode.
      (Jitendra Nath Pandey via szetszwo)
    11. HDFS-475. Add new ant targets for fault injection jars and tests.
      (Konstantin Boudnik via szetszwo)
    12. HDFS-458. Create a new ant target, run-commit-test.
      (Jakob Homan via szetszwo)
    13. HDFS-493. Change build.xml so that the fault-injected tests are executed only by the run-test-*-fault-inject targets.
      (Konstantin Boudnik via szetszwo)
    14. HDFS-446. Improvements to Offline Image Viewer.
      (Jakob Homan via shv)
    15. HADOOP-6160. Fix releaseaudit target to run on specific directories.
      (gkesavan)
    16. HDFS-501. Use enum to define the constants in DataTransferProtocol.
      (szetszwo)
    17. HDFS-508. Factor out BlockInfo from BlocksMap.
      (shv)
    18. HDFS-510. Rename DatanodeBlockInfo to be ReplicaInfo.
      (Jakob Homan & Hairong Kuang via shv)
    19. HDFS-500. Deprecate NameNode methods deprecated in NameNodeProtocol.
      (Jakob Homan via shv)
    20. HDFS-514. Change DFSClient.namenode from public to private.
      (Bill Zeller via szetszwo)
    21. HDFS-496. Use PureJavaCrc32 in HDFS.
      (Todd Lipcon via szetszwo)
    22. HDFS-511. Remove redundant block searches in BlockManager.
      (shv)
    23. HDFS-504. Update the modification time of a file when the file is closed.
      (Chun Zhang via dhruba)
    24. HDFS-498. Add development guide and documentation for the fault injection framework.
      (Konstantin Boudnik via szetszwo)
    25. HDFS-524. Further DataTransferProtocol code refactoring.
      (szetszwo)
    26. HDFS-529. Use BlockInfo instead of Block to avoid redundant block searches in BlockManager.
      (shv)
    27. HDFS-530. Refactor TestFileAppend* to remove code duplication.
      (Konstantin Boudnik via szetszwo)
    28. HDFS-451. Add fault injection tests for DataTransferProtocol.
      (szetszwo)
    29. HDFS-409. Add more access token tests.
      (Kan Zhang via szetszwo)
    30. HDFS-546. DatanodeDescriptor iterates blocks as BlockInfo.
      (shv)
    31. HDFS-457. Do not shutdown datanode if some, but not all, volumes fail.
      (Boris Shkolnik via szetszwo)
    32. HDFS-548. TestFsck takes nearly 10 minutes to run.
      (hairong)
    33. HDFS-539. Refactor fault injeciton pipeline test util for future reuse.
      (Konstantin Boudnik via szetszwo)
    34. HDFS-552. Change TestFiDataTransferProtocol to junit 4 and add a few new tests.
      (szetszwo)
    35. HDFS-563. Simplify the codes in FSNamesystem.getBlockLocations(..).
      (szetszwo)
    36. HDFS-581. Introduce an iterator over blocks in the block report array.
      (shv)
    37. HDFS-549. Add a new target, run-with-fault-inject-testcaseonly, which allows an execution of non-FI tests in FI-enable environment.
      (Konstantin Boudnik via szetszwo)
    38. HDFS-173. Namenode will not block until a large directory deletion completes. It allows other operations when the deletion is in progress.
      (suresh)
    39. HDFS-551. Create new functional test for a block report.
      (Konstantin Boudnik via hairong)
    40. HDFS-288. Redundant computation in hashCode() implementation.
      (szetszwo via tomwhite)
    41. HDFS-412. Hadoop JMX usage makes Nagios monitoring impossible.
      (Brian Bockelman via tomwhite)
    42. HDFS-472. Update hdfsproxy documentation. Adds a setup guide and design document.
      (Zhiyong Zhang via cdouglas)
    43. HDFS-617. Support non-recursive create().
      (Kan Zhang via szetszwo)
    44. HDFS-618. Support non-recursive mkdir().
      (Kan Zhang via szetszwo)
    45. HDFS-574. Split the documentation between the subprojects.
      (Corinne Chandel via omalley)
    46. HDFS-598. Eclipse launch task for HDFS.
      (Eli Collins via tomwhite)
    47. HDFS-641. Move all of the components that depend on map/reduce to map/reduce.
      (omalley)
    48. HDFS-509. Redesign DataNode volumeMap to include all types of Replicas.
      (hairong)
    49. HDFS-562. Add a test for NameNode.getBlockLocations(..) to check read from un-closed file.
      (szetszwo)
    50. HDFS-543. Break FSDatasetInterface#writToBlock() into writeToRemporary, writeToRBW, ad append.
      (hairong)
    51. HDFS-603. Add a new interface, Replica, which is going to replace the use of Block in datanode.
      (szetszwo)
    52. HDFS-589. Change block write protocol to support pipeline recovery.
      (hairong)
    53. HDFS-652. Replace BlockInfo.isUnderConstruction() with isComplete()
      (shv)
    54. HDFS-648. Change some methods in AppendTestUtil to public.
      (Konstantin Boudnik via szetszwo)
    55. HDFS-662. Unnecessary info message from DFSClient.
      (hairong)

      (Konstantin Boudnik via szetszwo)
    57. HDFS-688. Add configuration resources to DFSAdmin.
      (shv)
    58. HDFS-29. Validate the consistency of the lengths of replica and its file in replica recovery.
      (szetszwo)
    59. HDFS-680. Add new access method to a copy of a block's replica.
      (shv)
    60. HDFS-704. Unify build property names to facilitate cross-projects modifications
      (cos)
    61. HDFS-705. Create an adapter to access some of package-private methods of DataNode from tests
      (cos)
    62. HDFS-710. Add actions with constraints to the pipeline fault injection tests and change SleepAction to support uniform random sleeping over an interval.
      (szetszwo)
    63. HDFS-713. Need to properly check the type of the test class from an aspect
      (cos)
    64. HDFS-716. Define a pointcut for pipeline close and add a few fault injection tests to simulate out of memory problem.
      (szetszwo)
    65. HDFS-719. Add 6 fault injection tests for pipeline close to simulate slow datanodes and disk errors.
      (szetszwo)
    66. HDFS-616. Create functional tests for new design of the block report.
      (cos)
    67. HDFS-584. Fail the fault-inject build if any advices are mis-bound.
      (cos)
    68. HDFS-730. Add 4 fault injection tests to simulate non-responsive datanode and out-of-memory problem for pipeline close ack.
      (szetszwo)
    69. HDFS-728. Create a comprehensive functional test for append.
      (hairong)
    70. HDFS-736. commitBlockSynchronization() updates block GS and length in-place.

      (omalley)

  • OPTIMIZATIONS    (1)
    1. HDFS-946. NameNode should not return full path name when lisitng a diretory or getting the status of a file.
      (hairong)
  • BUG FIXES    (143)
    1. HDFS-76. Better error message to users when commands fail because of lack of quota. Allow quota to be set even if the limit is lower than current consumption.

      (Owen O'Malley)

      (shv)

Release 0.20.3 - Unreleased

  • IMPROVEMENTS    (none)
  • BUG FIXES    (4)
    1. HDFS-955. New implementation of saveNamespace() to avoid loss of edits when name-node fails during saving.
      (shv)
    2. HDFS-1041. DFSClient.getFileChecksum(..) should retry if connection to the first datanode fails.
      (szetszwo)
    3. HDFS-909. Wait until edits syncing is finishes before purging edits.
      (Todd Lipcon via shv)
    4. HDFS-1258. Clearing namespace quota on "/" corrupts fs image.
      (Aaron T. Myers via szetszwo)
